data.expected_result: The channel name properly displays, and goes to a new-line if need be.
data.short_description: Channel quick-select when entering a description for an uploaded file does not properly display if it overflows the max textbox width.
data.steps_to_repro: - Try to upload an image. Fill in the text box until there's just enough room to partially display a channel name. - Select a channel that will overflow the textbox size. Spacebar at the end in order for it to reset to the proper display.
